# GroupActivityMetadata.LifetimePolicy

**Structure**

An activity lifetime policy used by a Group Activity.

## Declaration

```swift
struct LifetimePolicy
```

## Overview

Activities that share content owned by the initiator may wish to customize their lifetime policy so that the activity ends when the initiator leaves.

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: The default lifetime policy for a group activity.
- **endsWhenInitiatorLeaves**: The activity should end when the initiator of the activity leaves.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
